messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Fw: The Importance of Following a Strict  School  Curr...
messages.msgSnippet: David, Is there a website where your spoof on ADTD can be found? ... No -- I posted it late last year -- I m currently rewriting it for my new column in Home
messages.messageBody:
David,

Is there a website where your spoof on ADTD can be found?
---

No -- I posted it late last year -- I'm currently rewriting it for my new
column in Home Education Magazine. Once the columns start (first one is in the
next issue), I'll start posting them on my website.

David
--
"And the Skylark Sings with Me is to homeschooling what Tom Paine's "Common
Sense" was to the American Revolution."-Greg Bates, Common Courage Press. to
read a sample chapter or reviews, or to check out my speaking schedule, visit
my website -- www.skylarksings.com -- or send an e-mail to
shantinik@...
